name: Puzzle Jump: A Platforming Adventure
description:
Puzzle Jump: A Platforming Adventure

Build levels with a given set of tiles for each level and then platform your way to victory!

This was an entry to the Thinky Games game jam. 

Controls for platforming are: 

WASD or Arrow Keys for movement

Spacebar for jumping and double jumping

Spacebar while pressing against a wall for wall jumping

shift for dashing

This build features 8 levels and restarts once all 8 have been played.  

---- Update 2 ChangeLog

Fixed the bug causing lines to show on the sides of the play area for any platforming level after level 1

Changed how enemies spawn to prevent the larger orange enemies from spawning on tiny platforms, causing them to be almost impossible to jump on without getting hurt

---- Update 1   ChangeLog

Fixed  a bug  that was preventing the play button from working even though all platforms were placed under certain conditions 

Fixed a bug where the player could click restart while holding  a platform breaking the reset

Changed how the colliders work when placing platforms to help prevent placing platforms outside of the play area

Updated the platforms given per level to ease the difficulty a tad as well as changed one of the available platforms to a new smaller platform that has more uses
